articles.title: Lawrence Wong says SG didn't close border with India due to need for migrant workers, but traveller stats shows otherwise - The Online Citizen SG
articles.description: The Online Citizen Asia Lawrence Wong says SG didn't close border with India due to need for migrant workers, but traveller stats shows otherwise Current Affairs
articles.content:

articles.title: Cyclist killed in crash with shuttle bus at NTU had just bought her bicycle, says husband who's currently in Malaysia - AsiaOne
